data.title: Tiny MVC Framework for NODEJS with ExpressJS
data.desc: Explore the power of NODEJS without wasting time thinking on coding stack.
data.long_desc:
https://github.com/basantashubhu/node-framework.git

Explore the power of NODEJS without wasting time thinking on coding stack. It's a tiny framework built with express, multer using typescript. This repository is helpful for college students and is publicly available on github to fork.

data.title: dCrypto | Sent crypto Across the world
data.desc: Explore the world of crypto, and start sending crypto to anyone.
data.long_desc:
https://crypto-madbasanta.vercel.app

Explore the world of crypto, and start sending crypto to anyone. You can transfer your ethereum coin to anyone just by linking your metamask account from the extension. You need to have metamask extension installed in your browser. Built with react & tailwind css.

data.title: Live Quiz Website
data.desc: A live quiz website for college assignment
data.long_desc: Aim of this project is to simplify the process of learning by adding little bit of fun and reward during learning phase specially made for LokSewa students. The website has basic functionalities like subscribing to favorite topic, search quiz, play quiz and earn, history and more.

data.title: Infectious Disease Control
data.desc: web application that provide every information about infectious disease and health resources
data.long_desc: web application that provide every information about infectious disease and health resources
